short_definition: To actively, knowingly, intentionally, or purposefully facilitate or assist another individual in the commission or attempted commission of a crime.
long_definition_html: To actively, knowingly, intentionally, or purposefully facilitate or assist another individual in the commission or attempted commission of a crime.
long_definition_markdown: To actively, knowingly, intentionally, or purposefully facilitate or assist another individual in the commission or attempted commission of a crime.
long_definition_text: To actively, knowingly, intentionally, or purposefully facilitate or assist another individual in the commission or attempted commission of a crime.
